alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 1:47PM CST until January 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER EXPECTED ON NEW YEARS DAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph could cause blowing snow. A light glaze of ice could develop on bridges and overpasses due to flash freezing as temperatures drop rapidly. * WHERE...Cimarron County. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chill values are expected to fall below zero on Saturday with values possibly as low as 10 below zero for some locations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call 844-465-4997 for road information.
